## About this app

 _arrow_forward_

DexWallet is a ecosystem of decentralized world. DexWallet is providing
decentralized Wallet, Staking, NFT's, in-app marketplace. User can trade their
assets through our decenralized spot exchange securely. Also we will provide
pancakesWap and UniSwap router supports for swapping.  
  
We are providing  
Multichain Wallet  
User can manage their cross-chain assets from this wallet. No need to use
different wallets for the different chains.  
  
Decentralized Exchange  
Centralized exchange is not secure completely. DexWallet is providing DEX
where user can trade like CEX spot trading.  
  
NFT's Marketplace  
DexWallet is not limited to managing user NFTs. Also, it provides an in-app
NFT marketplace. Use can buy or sell NFT on the marketplace.  
  
Staking  
DexWallet is providing chances to make money by staking their tokens.
DexWallet provides higher APY than any other staking platform. Users can earn
money by staking their tokens.  
  
DApp Browser  
DexWallet is providing a DApp browser. Users can browse different types of
websites and connect their wallets for payment. DApp browser is smooth and
fast.  
  
Swapping  
DexWallet is providing swapping through PancakeSwap and UniSwap routers. It
will provide you with an interface for swapping. You don't need to browse
their web app for swap.  
  
Launchpad  
DexWallet will provide a Launchpad where the developer can raise their funds
and investor can invest to make money. Everything from DexWallet, no need to
go anywhere outside of the app.

Updated on

Feb 8, 2023

Finance

Ray Perrin

 _more_vert_

  * Flag inappropriate

December 13, 2022

Has potential to rival trust wallet. Which I would love to see. However it's
advertised as a multi chain wallet. And currently everything is in bep20. I
know its still being developed, but probably should focus on adding other
chains. It would be really interesting to see the active bridge concept and
also being able to connect the wallet to outside defi products. Could be a
game changer to be able to cash out/buy crypto in the wallet instead of an
exchange. Cutting the middle man out.
